thread.title: Asia’s travel and tourism week returns to Singapore
thread.title_full: Asia’s travel and tourism week returns to Singapore

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Asia’s travel and tourism week returns to Singapore
text:
Asia’s travel and tourism week returns to Singapore     
TravelRave tourism week returns for its sixth run in Singapore as a platform for business leaders and industry professionals from across the region to exchange travel insights and expand networks. Organized by the Singapore Tourism Board (STB) from October 19-23, the business events week will see a line-up of speakers and events expounding on the trends and issues facing the travel ecosystem. 
Mr. Andrew Phua, Director of Exhibitions and Conferences, Singapore Tourism Board, said, “Launched in 2010, TravelRave has been shining the spotlight on Asian travel and tourism as a one-stop platform for industry professionals to gain strategic knowledge and insights into the region’s multi-faceted environment. TravelRave 2015 continues to catalyse business networking and travel innovations with a concentration of events that showcases new and exciting developments in Asia’s travel industry.” 
Complementing TravelRave 2015 again is the Asia Travel Leaders Summit (ATLS), a by-invite-only event organised by STB that brings together leading industry players to discuss travel trends of the region through the theme, “Frontiers in Focus.”
